caption.p: Structural representation of important phytochemicals. [1] Rhein (CID = 10,168); [2] Emodin (CID = 3220); [3] Lycorine (CID = 72,378); [4] Reserpine (CID = 5770); [5] Aescin (CID = 16211024); [6] Glycyrrhizin (CID = 128,229); [7] Chrysin (CID = 5281607); [8] Apigenin (CID = 5280443); [9] Luteolin (CID = 5280445); [10] Quercetin (CID = 5280343); [11] Scutellarein (CID = 5281697); [12] Myricetin (CID = 5281672); [13] Ferruginol (CID = 442,027); [14] Betulonic acid (CID = 122,844); and [15] α-cadinol (CID = 10398656); (Adopted from NCBI PubChem).
